message: Let's be fair, 60% for me is a good deal!
I'm feeling generous, but let's be more realistic. 55/45 split?
Come on, meet me in the middle, 58% is a good compromise!
Time is running out, Alice. 52/48 is my final offer.
Still not good enough, 57% and I'll take the risk of inflation!
Alice, inflation is eating your share fast. Take 490,000 while it's still worth something!
